Html:
Hi,

I'm using m:ui with Caliburn Micro, but I'm having problems with using the DefaultLinkNavigator from the ViewModel to browse to a new page.

What is the best way to do this? I don't want to have any UI Element references in my ViewModel.

Best Regards,
Martin
What UI elements do you want to keep from your view model?

Essentially all of them, that is the intension of mvvm.

What is the best way to navigate in my viewmodel?
